content:
Hi all - have begun working up some of the the profile around the Patient resource disucssions so far... this covers IHI, Medicare Number and Indigenous Status extension. https://simplifier.net/fhir-au/au-patient
Looking at a way to hook straight into the SMART on FHIR (AU) fork for http://fhir-au.azurewebsites.net/profiles/ content - might just put a link in....
